verbs.description: Trump [V: could] help his travel ban pass judicial muster if he ’d just repudiate the “ Muslim ban ” he called for during the 2016 campaign . He wo n’t , either because he ca n’t admit mistakes , or values the political appeal of religious prejudice , or both .

[ARG0: Trump] [ARGM-MOD: could] [V: help] [ARG1: his travel ban pass judicial muster] [ARGM-ADV: if he ’d just repudiate the “ Muslim ban ” he called for during the 2016 campaign . He wo n’t , either because he ca n’t admit mistakes , or values the political appeal of religious prejudice , or both] .

Trump could help [ARG0: his travel ban] [V: pass] [ARG1: judicial muster] if he ’d just repudiate the “ Muslim ban ” he called for during the 2016 campaign . He wo n’t , either because he ca n’t admit mistakes , or values the political appeal of religious prejudice , or both .
